revised_title: Sponge Anatomy and Physiology: Classification and Spicula Structures
tldr: The author examines the anatomy and physiology of sponges, focusing on their classification and the structure of spicula, which are essential for the sponge's organization and support. The author proposes a new classification system based on the unique structure of the spicula and discusses the various types and functions of these structures within the sponge.
